actions.name: Bless
actions.description: Bolster allies with divine favor.

actions.name: Create Water
actions.description: Drench an area and apply Wet.

actions.name: Shield
actions.description: Use your reaction to increase AC until next turn.

actions.name: Cloud of Daggers
actions.description: Create a slicing area of magical blades.

actions.name: Hold Person
actions.description: Paralyze a humanoid target on failed Wisdom save.

variants.description: Use metamagic to paralyze two humanoid targets.

actions.name: Spike Growth
actions.description: Shape the ground into hidden spikes.

actions.name: Haste
actions.description: Increase a target's speed and defenses.

actions.name: Spirit Guardians
actions.description: Summon guardian spirits around yourself.

actions.name: Counterspell
actions.description: Interrupt a spell being cast nearby.

actions.name: Globe of Invulnerability
actions.description: Create a dome that strongly mitigates incoming damage.

actions.name: Dash
actions.description: Increase movement for this turn.

actions.name: Hide
actions.description: Attempt to become hidden.

actions.name: Disengage
actions.description: Move without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Help
actions.description: Stabilize and assist an adjacent ally.

actions.name: Jump
actions.description: Use movement to reposition.

actions.name: Throw
actions.description: Throw an object at a target.

actions.name: Dip
actions.description: Dip your weapon to add elemental damage.

actions.name: Cleave
actions.description: A wide swing that can strike multiple enemies.

actions.name: Lacerate
actions.description: A slicing strike that causes bleeding.

actions.name: Smash
actions.description: A heavy impact that can daze.

actions.name: Topple
actions.description: A maneuver that knocks enemies prone.

actions.name: Pommel Strike
actions.description: A quick bonus-action strike that can daze.

actions.name: Off-Hand Attack
actions.description: Attack with your off-hand weapon as a bonus action.

actions.name: Tenacity
actions.description: Deal glancing damage even when the attack misses.

actions.name: Action Surge
actions.description: Push yourself beyond normal limits to take an additional action this turn.

actions.name: Second Wind
actions.description: Draw on your stamina to regain hit points.

actions.name: Cunning Action: Dash
actions.description: Use your quick reflexes to boost your movement speed.

actions.name: Cunning Action: Disengage
actions.description: Slip away from enemies without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Cunning Action: Hide
actions.description: Use your cunning to conceal yourself from enemies.

actions.name: Rage
actions.description: Enter a battle rage, gaining bonus damage and damage resistance.

actions.name: Reckless Attack
actions.description: Throw aside defense to attack with desperate ferocity.

actions.name: Frenzy
actions.description: Make a frenzied melee attack while raging.

actions.name: Turn Undead
actions.description: Channel divinity to frighten undead creatures within range.

actions.name: Preserve Life
actions.description: Channel divinity to restore health to wounded allies.

actions.name: Guided Strike
actions.description: Channel divinity to gain a +10 bonus to your next attack roll.

actions.name: Destructive Wrath
actions.description: Channel divinity to maximize thunder or lightning damage.

actions.name: Divine Smite
actions.description: Expend a spell slot to deal radiant damage on hit.

actions.name: Divine Smite (Level 2)
actions.description: Expend a 2nd level spell slot to deal increased radiant damage on hit.

actions.name: Lay on Hands
actions.description: Heal an ally with your divine touch.

actions.name: Aura of Protection
actions.description: Your divine presence bolsters nearby allies' saving throws.

actions.name: Symbiotic Entity
actions.description: Channel necromantic energy to empower yourself.

actions.name: Healing Word
actions.description: Speak a healing word to restore health to an ally.

actions.name: Produce Flame
actions.description: Hurl a ball of fire at your enemy.

actions.name: Bardic Inspiration
actions.description: Inspire an ally with words of encouragement, granting them a Bardic Inspiration die (d6 at base, scales with bard level).

actions.name: Bardic Inspiration (d6)
actions.description: Inspire an ally with words of encouragement, granting them a d6 Bardic Inspiration die.

actions.name: Bardic Inspiration (d10)
actions.description: Inspire an ally with words of encouragement, granting them a d10 Bardic Inspiration die.

actions.name: Cutting Words
actions.description: Use your wit to distract and penalize an enemy's attack or save with a Bardic Inspiration die (d8 at level 5, scales with bard level).

actions.name: Cutting Words (d6)
actions.description: Use your wit to distract and penalize an enemy's attack or save with a d6 Bardic Inspiration die.

actions.name: Cutting Words (d10)
actions.description: Use your wit to distract and penalize an enemy's attack or save with a d10 Bardic Inspiration die.

actions.name: Blade Flourish
actions.description: Execute a flourish with your weapon, boosting AC and damage.

actions.name: Flurry of Blows
actions.description: Strike twice with lightning-fast unarmed attacks.

actions.name: Stunning Strike
actions.description: Strike with precision to stun your opponent.

actions.name: Step of the Wind
actions.description: Move with supernatural grace, dashing and disengaging simultaneously.

actions.name: Patient Defence
actions.description: Enter a defensive stance, dodging incoming attacks.

actions.name: Create Sorcery Points
actions.description: Convert a spell slot into sorcery points.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast
actions.description: A beam of eldritch energy strikes a creature within range.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (2 Beams)
actions.description: Two beams of eldritch energy strike creatures within range.

actions.name: Hex
actions.description: Place a curse on a creature, weakening their saves and dealing extra damage.

actions.name: Great Weapon Master Power Attack
actions.description: Toggle: Take -5 penalty to attack rolls to gain +10 to damage with heavy weapons.

actions.name: Great Weapon Master Cleave
actions.description: Make a melee weapon attack as a bonus action after a critical hit or reducing a creature to 0 HP.

actions.name: Sharpshooter Power Shot
actions.description: Toggle: Take -5 penalty to ranged attack rolls to gain +10 to damage.

actions.name: Polearm Butt Attack
actions.description: Make a bonus action attack with the blunt end of your polearm, dealing 1d4 + STR bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Polearm Reach Attack
actions.description: When a creature enters your reach, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against them.

actions.name: Tavern Brawler: Throw
actions.description: Throw an item or improvised weapon, dealing 1d4 + STR damage and adding twice your STR modifier.

actions.name: Sentinel Reaction
actions.description: When a creature within melee range attacks an ally, you can use your reaction to make a weapon attack against that creature, reducing their speed to 0.

actions.name: Lucky (Attack)
actions.description: Spend a luck point to gain advantage on your next attack roll.

actions.name: Lucky (Check)
actions.description: Spend a luck point to gain advantage on your next ability check.

actions.name: Lucky (Save)
actions.description: Spend a luck point to gain advantage on your next saving throw.

actions.name: Lucky (Enemy Reroll)
actions.description: Spend a luck point to force an enemy to reroll their attack against you.

actions.name: War Caster Reaction
actions.description: When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack, you can use your reaction to cast Shocking Grasp.

actions.name: Fireball
actions.description: Hurl a ball of fire that explodes in a fiery blast.

actions.name: Magic Missile
actions.description: Launch three unerring missiles of magical force.

actions.name: Cure Wounds
actions.description: Touch an ally to restore their health.

actions.name: Guiding Bolt
actions.description: A flash of light streaks toward your target, marking them for the next attack.

variants.description: Use metamagic to strike two targets with guiding bolts of light.

actions.name: Spiritual Weapon
actions.description: Summon a spectral weapon that fights for you.

actions.name: Sacred Flame
actions.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature within range.

variants.description: Use metamagic to cast Sacred Flame as a bonus action.

actions.name: Fire Bolt
actions.description: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object.

variants.description: Use metamagic to cast Fire Bolt as a bonus action.

actions.name: Ray of Frost
actions.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature.

variants.description: Use metamagic to cast Ray of Frost as a bonus action.

actions.name: Toll the Dead
actions.description: Sound the bell of doom for your enemies. Deals 1d8 necrotic damage, or 1d12 if the target has taken damage.

actions.name: Sleep
actions.description: Send enemies into a slumber. Affects creatures starting with the lowest HP until the spell's hit point pool is exhausted.

actions.name: Hunter's Mark
actions.description: Mark your quarry for extra damage.

actions.name: Divine Smite
actions.description: Toggle: Expend a spell slot on melee weapon hit for bonus radiant damage.

actions.name: Trip Attack
actions.description: Expend a superiority die to attempt to knock the target prone. Add d8 to damage.

actions.name: Riposte
actions.description: When an enemy misses you, use your reaction to strike back with bonus damage.

actions.name: Menacing Attack
actions.description: Expend a superiority die to frighten the target. Add d8 to damage.

actions.name: Bane
actions.description: Curse up to 3 enemies with dark magic. -1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws.

actions.name: Misty Step
actions.description: Teleport up to 18m as a bonus action.

actions.name: Shield of Faith
actions.description: Grant an ally +2 AC with divine protection.

actions.name: Scorching Ray
actions.description: Hurl 3 rays of fire. Each ray deals 2d6 fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Bolt
actions.description: Hurl two motes of fire at a creature or object.

actions.name: Fire Bolt
actions.description: Hurl three motes of fire at a creature or object.

actions.name: Sacred Flame
actions.description: Stronger radiance descends on a creature within range.

actions.name: Sacred Flame
actions.description: Powerful radiance descends on a creature within range.

actions.name: Ray of Frost
actions.description: Twin frigid beams of blue-white light streak toward a creature.

actions.name: Ray of Frost
actions.description: Triple frigid beams of blue-white light streak toward a creature.

actions.name: Toll the Dead
actions.description: Sound the louder bell of doom for your enemies. Deals 2d8 necrotic damage, or 2d12 if the target has taken damage.

actions.name: Toll the Dead
actions.description: Sound the deafening bell of doom for your enemies. Deals 3d8 necrotic damage, or 3d12 if the target has taken damage.

actions.name: Produce Flame
actions.description: Hurl larger balls of fire at your enemy.

actions.name: Produce Flame
actions.description: Hurl massive balls of fire at your enemy.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (3 Beams)
actions.description: Three beams of eldritch energy strike creatures within range.

actions.name: Ensnaring Strike
actions.description: Magical vines wrap around your target on your next weapon hit, restraining them. Bonus action concentration spell.

actions.name: Hail of Thorns
actions.description: Thorny vines explode around your next target on a successful weapon hit, dealing damage to all creatures nearby. Bonus action concentration spell.

actions.name: Colossus Slayer
actions.description: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack that has already taken damage this combat, deal an extra 1d8 damage.

actions.name: Primeval Awareness
actions.description: Focus your senses to detect the presence of aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead within 1 mile.

actions.name: Hide in Plain Sight
actions.description: You can conceal yourself with camouflage, gaining +10 to Stealth checks when hidden against a solid surface.

actions.name: Wild Shape: Wolf
actions.description: Transform into a wolf. Gain the wolf's stats and abilities.

actions.name: Wild Shape: Bear
actions.description: Transform into a brown bear. Gain the bear's stats and abilities.

actions.name: Wild Shape: Giant Spider
actions.description: Transform into a giant spider. Gain the spider's stats and abilities.

actions.name: End Wild Shape
actions.description: Revert to your normal form.

actions.name: Mage Armor
actions.description: Touch a creature that isn't wearing armor. Its base AC becomes 13 + DEX modifier until the spell ends.

actions.name: Mirror Image
actions.description: Create 3 illusory duplicates. Attacks against you may hit duplicates instead.

actions.name: Armor of Agathys
actions.description: Gain 5 temporary HP. While you have these temp HP, attackers take 5 cold damage.

actions.name: Faerie Fire
actions.description: Outline creatures in light. Attacks against them have advantage.

actions.name: Command
actions.description: Issue a one-word command to a creature. Approach, Drop, Flee, Grovel, or Halt.

actions.name: Sanctuary
actions.description: Ward a creature against attack. Enemies must make a save to attack the target.

actions.name: Hellish Rebuke
actions.description: Use your reaction when damaged to deal 2d10 fire damage to the attacker.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: Exhale a 30-foot line of acid. Creatures in the area must make a DEX save or take 2d6 acid damage (half on save).

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: Exhale a 30-foot line of fire. Creatures in the area must make a DEX save or take 2d6 fire damage (half on save).

actions.name: Fire Breath (Cone)
actions.description: Exhale a 15-foot cone of fire. Creatures in the area must make a DEX save or take 2d6 fire damage (half on save).

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.description: Exhale a 15-foot cone of frost. Creatures in the area must make a CON save or take 2d6 cold damage (half on save).

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: Exhale a 30-foot line of lightning. Creatures in the area must make a DEX save or take 2d6 lightning damage (half on save).

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: Exhale a 15-foot cone of poison. Creatures in the area must make a CON save or take 2d6 poison damage (half on save).

actions.name: Astral Knowledge
actions.description: Channel psionic power to gain proficiency in a skill. (Utility ability - no tactical combat effect)

actions.name: Mage Hand
actions.description: Create a spectral hand that can manipulate objects at range. (Utility ability - no tactical combat effect)

actions.name: Enhance Leap
actions.description: Your jump distance is tripled for the duration. (Utility ability - no tactical combat effect)

actions.name: Wizard Cantrip
actions.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. This is a placeholder passive ability.

actions.name: Arcane Recovery
actions.description: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can recover expended spell slots. (Utility ability - no tactical combat effect)

actions.name: Intimidating Presence
actions.description: You can use your action to frighten someone with your menacing presence. Choose one creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of your next turn.

actions.name: War Priest
actions.description: When you use the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once).

actions.name: War God's Blessing
actions.description: Grant a +10 bonus to an ally's attack roll. (Simplified - no complex status mechanics)

actions.name: Divine Sense
actions.description: Detect celestials, fiends, and undead nearby

actions.name: Wild Shape
actions.description: Transform into a beast form

actions.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
actions.description: Undead within 9m must make WIS save or be turned for 1 minute

actions.name: Light
actions.description: Touch an object to make it shed light

actions.name: Mending
actions.description: Repair a single break or tear in an object

actions.name: Prestidigitation
actions.description: Perform minor magical tricks

actions.name: Thaumaturgy
actions.description: Manifest minor wonders that show divine power

actions.name: Minor Illusion
actions.description: Create an illusion of a sound or image

actions.name: Dancing Lights
actions.description: Create up to four lights that hover in the air

actions.name: True Strike
actions.description: Gain advantage on next attack against target

actions.name: Friends
actions.description: Gain advantage on Charisma checks against one creature

actions.name: Spare the Dying
actions.description: Stabilize a dying creature

actions.name: Resistance
actions.description: Target gains +1d4 to next saving throw

actions.name: Shillelagh
actions.description: Imbue a club or quarterstaff with nature's power

actions.name: Guidance
actions.description: Target gains +1d4 to next ability check

actions.name: Minor Conjuration
actions.description: Conjure an inanimate object in an unoccupied space within 10 feet.

actions.name: Benign Transposition
actions.description: Teleport up to 30 feet or swap places with a willing creature.

actions.name: The Third Eye
actions.description: Increase your powers of perception with darkvision, ethereal sight, greater comprehension, or see invisibility.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.description: Charm a creature within 5 feet until the end of your next turn, reducing its speed to 0.

actions.name: Minor Alchemy
actions.description: Temporarily alter the physical properties of one nonmagical object.

actions.name: Transmuter's Stone
actions.description: Create a transmuter's stone that grants darkvision, speed, Constitution save proficiency, or elemental resistance.

actions.name: Shapechanger
actions.description: Transform yourself into a beast with CR 1 or lower without expending a spell slot.

actions.name: Bladesong
actions.description: Enter a defensive stance granting AC bonus equal to Intelligence modifier, advantage on Acrobatics, and concentration save bonuses.

actions.name: Dragon Wings
actions.description: Sprout dragon wings, gaining a flying speed equal to your current speed.

actions.name: Tides of Chaos
actions.description: Gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

actions.name: Storm Guide
actions.description: Stop rain or wind in a 20-foot radius, or change wind direction.

actions.name: Hound of Ill Omen
actions.description: Summon a dire wolf-like hound to harass a target. The hound uses dire wolf statistics.

actions.name: Shadow Walk
actions.description: Teleport up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space in dim light or darkness.

actions.name: Create Spell Slot
actions.description: Transform sorcery points into a spell slot as a bonus action.

actions.name: Fey Presence
actions.description: Cause creatures in a 10-foot cube to become charmed or frightened until the end of your next turn.

actions.name: Dark One's Own Luck
actions.description: Add a d10 to your ability check or saving throw.

actions.name: Hexblade's Curse
actions.description: Curse a creature, gaining bonus damage, critical hits on 19-20, and healing when it dies.

actions.name: Accursed Specter
actions.description: Raise a slain humanoid as a specter that serves you.

actions.name: Mantle of Inspiration
actions.description: Grant temporary hit points and allow allies to move without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Enthralling Performance
actions.description: Charm humanoids who watch and listen to your 1-minute performance.

actions.name: Mantle of Majesty
actions.description: Cast Command without expending a spell slot as a bonus action for 1 minute.

actions.name: Countercharm
actions.description: Grant yourself and allies within 30 feet advantage on saves against being frightened or charmed.

actions.name: Warding Flare
actions.description: Impose disadvantage on an attack roll against you by flaring divine light.

actions.name: Radiance of the Dawn
actions.description: Dispel magical darkness and deal 2d10 + cleric level radiant damage to hostile creatures within 30 feet.

actions.name: Blessing of the Trickster
actions.description: Grant an ally advantage on Stealth checks for 1 hour.

actions.name: Invoke Duplicity
actions.description: Create an illusory duplicate of yourself that lasts 1 minute. You can cast spells from its space.

actions.name: Cloak of Shadows
actions.description: Become invisible until the end of your next turn or until you attack or cast a spell.

actions.name: Knowledge of the Ages
actions.description: Gain proficiency with any skill or tool for 10 minutes.

actions.name: Read Thoughts
actions.description: Read surface thoughts of a creature within 60 feet.

actions.name: Charm Animals and Plants
actions.description: Charm beasts and plant creatures within 30 feet for 1 minute.

actions.name: Touch of Death
actions.description: Deal 5 + twice your cleric level necrotic damage on a melee attack hit.

actions.name: Divine Intervention
actions.description: Call on your deity to intervene when your need is great. Roll percentile dice; if you roll equal to or lower than your cleric level, your deity intervenes.

actions.name: Sacred Weapon
actions.description: Imbue a weapon with positive energy for 1 minute. Add Charisma to attack rolls and it emits bright light.

actions.name: Turn the Unholy
actions.description: Turn fiends and undead within 30 feet for 1 minute.

actions.name: Nature's Wrath
actions.description: Spectral vines restrain a creature within 10 feet until it escapes.

actions.name: Turn the Faithless
actions.description: Turn fey and fiends within 30 feet for 1 minute.

actions.name: Abjure Enemy
actions.description: Frighten a creature within 60 feet and reduce its speed to 0 for 1 minute or until it takes damage.

actions.name: Vow of Enmity
actions.description: Gain advantage on attack rolls against a creature for 1 minute.

actions.name: Champion's Challenge
actions.description: Compel creatures within 30 feet to battle with you. They can't willingly move more than 30 feet away.

actions.name: Turn the Tide
actions.description: Bolster injured creatures within 30 feet, healing them for 1d6 + Charisma modifier if they have half HP or less.

actions.name: Control Undead
actions.description: Command an undead creature within 30 feet to obey you for 24 hours.

actions.name: Dreadful Aspect
actions.description: Frighten creatures within 30 feet for 1 minute.

actions.name: Spreading Spores
actions.description: Hurl spores up to 30 feet, creating difficult terrain and dealing Halo of Spores damage.

actions.name: Starry Form
actions.description: Take a starry form (Archer, Chalice, or Dragon) for 10 minutes.

actions.name: Volley
actions.description: Attack all creatures in a 10-foot radius with ranged attacks.

actions.name: Whirlwind Attack
actions.description: Melee attack all creatures within 5 feet of you.

actions.name: Primal Companion
actions.description: Summon a primal beast (Beast of the Land, Sea, or Sky) to aid you.

actions.name: Writhing Tide
actions.description: Gain a flying speed of 10 feet and hover for 1 minute.

actions.name: Ensnaring Strike
actions.description: Magical vines restrain your target on hit. They take 1d6 piercing damage each turn.

actions.name: Hail of Thorns
actions.description: Your next ranged weapon attack creates an explosion of thorns in a 5-foot radius dealing 1d10 piercing damage.

actions.name: Arcane Shot
actions.description: Unleash special magical effects with your arrows. Choose from various Arcane Shot options.

actions.name: Magic Awareness
actions.description: Sense the presence of magic within 60 feet until the end of your next turn.

actions.name: Bolstering Magic
actions.description: Touch yourself or an ally and roll a d3. The creature gains a bonus to attack rolls and ability checks for 10 minutes.

actions.name: Elemental Cleave
actions.description: Your weapon unleashes elemental energy in a 30-foot line while raging.

actions.name: Crushing Throw
actions.description: Hurl a Large or smaller creature up to 30 feet in a straight line while raging.

actions.name: Wholeness of Body
actions.description: Regain hit points equal to three times your monk level.

actions.name: Shadow Step
actions.description: Teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space in dim light or darkness. Gain advantage on your next melee attack.

actions.name: Stillness of Mind
actions.description: End one effect causing you to be charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Panache
actions.description: Make a Persuasion check contested by a creature's Insight. On success, hostile creatures have disadvantage against non-you targets; non-hostile creatures are charmed for 1 minute.

actions.name: Charge: Weapon Attack
actions.description: Charge forward and make a melee weapon attack that deals an extra 5 damage on hit. Charging does not provoke opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Charge: Shove
actions.description: Charge forward and shove a creature, pushing it back 3m. Charging does not provoke opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Defensive Duellist
actions.description: When you are hit by a melee attack while wielding a finesse weapon, use your reaction to add your proficiency bonus to your AC for that attack.

actions.name: Mage Slayer
actions.description: When a creature within melee range casts a spell, use your reaction to make a weapon attack against that creature. The target also has disadvantage on concentration saving throws from your attacks.

actions.name: Shield Master: Block
actions.description: Use your reaction when targeted by a spell that requires a Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, take no damage instead of half damage.

actions.name: Crippling Strike
actions.description: A targeted strike that hampers the enemy's movement. Deal weapon damage and reduce target's speed by 50%.

actions.name: Hindering Smash
actions.description: A crushing blow that hinders the target's ability to strike back, imposing disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Piercing Thrust
actions.description: A precise stab that exploits gaps in the target's defences, dealing additional piercing damage.

actions.name: Brace (Ranged)
actions.description: Steady your aim to gain advantage on your next ranged attack roll.

actions.name: Flourish
actions.description: Put your full strength behind a devastating swing, dealing extra damage at the cost of accuracy.

actions.name: Rush Attack
actions.description: Charge forward and strike in one motion. Move up to 9m and make a melee weapon attack.

actions.name: Brace (Melee)
actions.description: Plant your feet to gain advantage on your next melee attack roll.

actions.name: Piercing Shot
actions.description: Fire a shot that pierces through the first target to hit enemies behind them in a line.

actions.name: Mobile Shot
actions.description: Fire while moving without triggering opportunity attacks. Make a ranged attack and move freely.

actions.name: Brace (Crossbow)
actions.description: Steady your crossbow to gain advantage on your next ranged attack roll.

actions.name: Hamstring Shot
actions.description: A precisely aimed shot to the legs, reducing the target's movement speed by half.

actions.name: Backbreaker
actions.description: A devastating blow that can knock the target prone and leave them off-balance.

actions.name: Heartstopper
actions.description: A powerful strike that prevents the target from healing until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Flourish
actions.description: A deft weapon flourish that deals weapon damage and grants advantage on your next attack against the same target.

actions.name: Headcrack
actions.description: A well-aimed shot to the head that can daze the target, imposing disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Disarming Strike
actions.description: A precise strike that can force the target to drop what they are holding, imposing disadvantage on attacks.
